name: Ultimate Custom Pong
description:
Ultimate Custom Pong!

Just like normal pong, but players draw their paddels at the start of the game to make them whatever shape they want. Currently this is a 2 person 1 keyboard game. I might make a LAN version in the coming weeks.

This (like many of my projects) was made in a week Thus, other then a LAN version this is the final state of the project.

Controls:

Esc to go to menu

Player 1:

WASD: Move

QE: Rotate 

Player 2:

IJKL or arrow keys: Move\

UO: Move


Credits:

Font from daniel linssen's M5x7 here on itch

color pallet used from Poltergasm's Bitbee on lospec

made in Godot
